edu.columbia.cs.sdarts.frontend
Class SDARTSConfig

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--edu.columbia.cs.sdarts.common.LSPObject
        |
        +--edu.columbia.cs.sdarts.frontend.SDARTSConfig
public class SDARTSConfig
extends LSPObject

The object that SDARTS uses to configure itself upon start-up. It is an objectified version of the sdarts_config.xml file that is read in. This descriptor tells SDARTS where to find the STARTS DTD, where to find the SDLIP DTD, and the characteristics of any BackEndLSPs it is serving.

Typically, this descriptor is created by the SDARTSConfigBuilder, which reads in the configuration file. For more information about this configuration file, see the sdarts_config DTD.
